TaskDescription: Before we start programing the process line, we need to understand the bacis. We will work mostly whit boolean values.The change of state is called edge. FALSE -> TRUE is rising edge TRUE -> FALSE is falling edge. In this tutorial we will use edge detection of lower middle button (tag IO.ButtonBlackLeftDown, key S) to detect the edges. But how do we programaticly detect pulse change? Your PLC somulator constantly loops the code written in MAIN. Declare boolean variable buttonOldValue and at the end of current code assign value of ButtonBlackLeftDown to it. Now write and if statement that will check if buttonOldValue is different from current ButtonBlackLeftDown value. If it is, then we have detected the edge. Which one? On rising edge, start Timer Pulse or shorter TP timer and set in on 2 seconds. Link timers output to lower blue light (tag LEDBlueDown) and the light will turn on for 2 seconds after button was pressed Start testing as soon as you press down the button.
